Title: Relates to establishing the New York state education equity fund and authorizing the dormitory authority of the state of New York to invest to cover capital costs for charter schools
Summary: Establishes a New York state education equity fund; authorizes the dormitory authority of the state of New York (DASNY) to invest $75 million in a public-private partnership revolving loan fund for loan financing to cover capital costs for the construction and improvements of public charter schools.
LawCode: Add §99-qq, St Fin L; amd §§1678, 1680 & 1676, Pub Auth L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law and the public authorities law, in relation to establishing the New York state education equity fund and authorizing the dormitory authority of the state of New York to invest to cover capital costs for the construction and improvements of public charter schools
